name: Aethra Chronicles Chapter 1: Celysta's Bane
description:
Aethra Chronicles Chapter 1: Celysta's Bane is a RPG game developed by Michael W. Lawrence. It was originally released in 1994. Michael W. Lawrence published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Aethra Chronicles Chapter 1: Celysta's Bane is available on PC.
